sleeping.how: Want to sleep? Come to the Sleeping Zone and we'll give you an air mattress for resting all you need :zzz:
sleeping.when: You can rest in the Sleeping Zone whenever you need, but you can only get an air mattress until 2AM.
sleeping.where: Sleeping Zone will be located in the whole A3 building and second floor of A4 building.

checkin.how: Come to the Check-in Zone bringing your ID and we'll give you your accreditation for joining HackUPC 2018! :parrot:
checkin.when:
The check-in will be open from 3PM to 6:30PM on Friday 19th.:watch:
 If you are late no worries, there will be a Late Check-in after Open Ceremony in the InfoDesk.
checkin.where: Check-in is located between A5 and A6 buildings :building_construction:

meals.how: We don't want hungry hackers in HackUPC! We'll serve breakfast, lunch, dinner and a midnight snack during the whole weekend. :shallow_pan_of_food:
meals.when: For checking when the meals will be served, we'd recommend to take a look to hackupc.com/live :yum:
meals.where: All the meals will be served outside A5 and A6 buildings.

default.how: Sorry, I don't know what do you mean. But you can check maps.hackupc.com and you will find all possible places and hackupc.com/live for checking all the activities.
